name: UpdatePartnerClient
description:
Update details of a partner client in HubSpot CRM.

This tool is used to modify the information of a specified partner client in HubSpot CRM. It should be called when there is a need to update or change details related to a partner client using their unique ID.

parameters.name: partner_client_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the partner client to be updated in HubSpot CRM.

parameters.name: partner_client_update_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing key-value pairs of properties to update for the partner client.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

parameters.name: identifier_property
parameters.description: Specify the property name used to identify the partner client for update operations.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_crm API.

properties.description: Key value pairs representing the properties of the object.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
